searchBar.placeholder: Keyword of the project you are interested in

hero.title: Showcase your potential and let job opportunities find you
hero.subtitle: Pportfolio is a platform that gamifies the whole recruitment experience while helps you power, discover and learn new abilities.
hero.beta: Beta is on its way and big things are coming
hero.step5Title: 5. Get top employment offers or advance
hero.step1subtitle: It doesn't matter if you have experience, a diploma, or not, just choose what you like. Some of the most popular are: data science, UX / UI designer, copywritter, among many others
hero.step2subtitle: Do you have experience? Great! Here choose the level according to your ability, this will define the league where you will participate: Student, Junior, Senior or Top
hero.step3subtitle: We present the weekly challenge, the objectives, rules and details that you need to know and, now you can start creating!
hero.step4subtitle: Create and improve to get to the top 100 to start having company visualization and employment offers.
hero.step5subtitle: Accept the offer from a company or go to the next level.

hero2.title: Companies and organizations that support Pportfol.io
hero2.substitle: Do you want to launch your digital career? We don't care about your titles, only your skills!
hero2.explanation: At Pportfolio we do not believe in titles or in the traditional form of evaluation and we believe that things have to change. That is why we want to promote the learning by doing. We help you improve and create your career whoever you are.

hero3.title: Still having some doubts?
hero3.subtitle: Let's clarify some things here
hero3.whatSub: Pportfolio is a tournament-based platform for digital talent recruitment & development that focuses on hands-on skills rather than titles.
hero3.step1subtitle: It doesn't matter if you have experience, a diploma, or not, just choose what you like. Some of the most popular are: data science, UX / UI designer, copywritter, among many others
hero3.step2subtitle: Do you have experience? Great! Here choose the level according to your ability, this will define the league where you will participate: Student, Junior, Senior or Top
hero3.step3subtitle: We present the weekly challenge, the objectives, rules and details that you need to know and, now you can start creating!
hero3.step4subtitle: Create and improve to get to the top 100 to start having company visualization and employment offers.
hero3.step5subtitle: Accept the offer from a company or go to the next level.

hero4.title: Do you have questions, need some help? We are here for you.

helmet.title: Portfolio | Find the talent you deserve

hero.title: Discover the digital talent your company needs
hero.subtitle: We improve the direct profile search by providing a unique dashboard powered by a gamified pselection latform.
hero.button: Subscribe me for the beta launch

hero2.title: Ventures supporting Pportfol.io
hero2.subtitle: You have the projects, we have the talent.
hero2.description: Discover the profile that fits wihtin your company philosofy, team and skillset needed, easier and faster than ever.
hero2.button2: I want a free demo now

hero3.title: Why Portfolio?
hero3.feat1desc: Find the best profiles within the skills you are looking for with a simple glance at the list of participants in our leagues.
hero3.feat2sub: Verify your profile skills without interviews
hero3.feat2desc: Get profiles that fit 100% with your expectations and requirements. With a few questions we take care of showing you the best profiles.
hero3.feat3desc: We create challenges and tournaments with a triple objective: to validate knowledge, offer a unique recruitment experience and finally help both the user and the company to improve.
hero3.feat4sub: Team-profile compatibility management like never before
hero3.feat4desc: We connect your team with the participants in a much more relaxed environment and without the need to arrange interviews. What better way to see the affinity than working together right?
hero3.feat5sub: Artificial power that measures the most human
hero3.feat5desc: A powerful dashboard to customize the profile you are looking for based on your team, project and defined requirements. Stop screening CVs, go to Pportfolio.

editable.name: Name
editable.picContext: To update your profile picture just paste the link from the your favourite social media picture
editable.urlContext: Here you can change your personal url. This part will go at the end of pporfol.io/. Be aware that once you cange it, the old one will be deleted
editable.majorDescr: Aerospace, industrial, arquitechture, biotech,computer science, developer, etc

editProject.title: Edit
editProject.contentText: You're about to edit this project. Once you save it, you can't go back
editProject.tagPlaceHolder: Add up to 3 skills to this project

premium.title: We are currently working to have the best services ready and the final touches are missing so you can get the most out of your portfolio with your premium account. If you have questions or would like to know more about the current situation of the project, please fill out the form in the contact area.
premium.description: In order to be able to see the analaytics of your projects, account, customize styles, colors, improve positioning and much more, you must have a premium subscription. If you want to go to premium you can do it right now, it will take only 5 '.

addproject.dialogContent: To create a new project you just have to choose the type of image you want to see, add the title, the link where you have your saved project and description.
addproject.recomendation2: to give colour to your projects. You can find amazing free pictures

tutorial.contextURL: Here you can customize how you want your public url to look. Before changing it, keep in mind that the initial you defined will be free.
tutorial.case1: In the side panel you will find a tab that takes you to the configuration of your profile there you can edit all your personal data.
tutorial.case2: On any of the screens you will see a button at the bottom right that allows you to create projects. Clicking on add project will open a popup with all the instructions. To see the projects, delete them or edit them you just have to go to your projects panel (dashboard) which you can access using the sidebar.
tutorial.finishInfo: Everyhing done! Enjoy your creating your Pportfolio!

home.feedbackProject_descp: Rate community projects and receive extra points in return
home.feedbackToMyProjects_descp: Learn from your mistakes thanks to community feedback
home.myProjects_descp: Review and update your projects, description, etc

cookies.text1: Use of cookies: We use our own and third party cookies
cookies.text2: to improve our services by analyzing your navigation
cookies.text3: habits. If you go on surfing, we will consider you're accepting its use.

policy.checkboxText: I have read and accept the privacy policies
policy.notChecked: In order to create an account you must first accept the terms and conditions of use.
